mapper.select: select RBAC_User.FirstName, RBAC_User.LastName, RBAC_AuthorityType.id, RBAC_AuthorityType.name, RBAC_Authority.effectiveFrom, RBAC_Authority.effectiveTo from RBAC_Authority authority, RBAC_Authorization rbacAuthorization, RBAC_AuthorityType authorityType, RBAC_User rbacUser where (authority.AuthorizationId = rbacAuthorization.Id and authority.AuthorityTypeId = authorityType.Id and rbacAuthorization.userActiveDirectoryId = rbacUser.Id and rbacAuthorization.userActiveDirectoryId = #{userActiveDirectoryId} and authorityType.type = 'PERMISSION') or (authorityType.roleId = authority.AuthorityTypeId)
